settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.label: Bottom Border Color
settings.info: Default Value: #ebebeb, show in collection page

settings.content: used for Level Top Menu, Header Top, Page Title, Block Title, Button Text

settings.label: Enable Sticky Menu
settings.info: Sticky navigation (also called a fixed navigation) is basically a website menu that is locked into place at the top of the screen so that it does not disappear when the user scrolls down the page; in other words, it is accessible from anywhere on the website without having to scroll.

settings.label: Assign To Menu:
settings.info: (*) Enter "Link Name" of "Navigation / Main Menu" into Menu item 1 box

settings.label: Enable Full Width
settings.info: If you check this option the dropdown menu will be stretched to the full width of the primary container.

settings.label: Fixed Width
settings.info: Used pixcel (eg: 1000px). Leave empty if selected fullwidth.

settings.label: Width: Number column of Links
settings.info: Number of columns in a row (eg: 1..12, max-column:12)

settings.label: Width: Number column of block
settings.info: Number of columns in a row (eg: 1..12, max-column:12)

settings.label: Columns of block product
settings.info: Number of columns in a row (eg: 1..12, max-column:12)

settings.label: Video Content
settings.info: Copy Video CODE from youtube, vimeo and put here

settings.label: Resize image
settings.info: If your images don't have the same size, pleases turn on resize image to have better look.

settings.label: Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency

settings.content: Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Allow customers to add notes to their order
settings.info: Only enabled in the ajax cart if you use your cart.liquid markup. See docs below.
